sentence.Network_en: Moreover, people are not " all - knowing, or to have a perfect - control. "
sentence.Network_cn: 此外人也不是 “ 无所不知, 或者拥有完美的自控制力 ”.

sentence.Network_en: Jenny is so smart, at times she seems all - knowing.
sentence.Network_cn: 詹妮很聪明, 有时候她似乎无所不知.

sentence.Network_en: Giving top priority almost all - knowing teacher will allow students to respect.
sentence.Network_cn: 举一反三,举重若轻,信手拈来,几乎无所不知的老师才会让学生肃然起敬.

...在制作动画时企图扮演上帝（play God），采取无所不知（all-knowing）的观点和视角。

list.abs: 八年级英语期中词汇单词表_百度文库 ... in public 在公共场合 as we all know 众所周知 in the same day 在同一天.

yes , jim . we all know what you like ., 当然 , 吉姆 , 我们都知道你喜欢的类型.
light travels faster than sound , as we all know ., 正如我们所知的那样 , 光比声音传播得快.
the one to know all the answers ., 那个人才会知道所有答案.
